statements: SELECT * FROM project_knowledge_base
SELECT project_name, documentation FROM project_knowledge_base ORDER BY project_name ASC
SELECT project_id, project_name, best_practices FROM project_knowledge_base WHERE project_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT project_name, lessons_learned FROM project_knowledge_base WHERE project_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT * FROM project_knowledge_base WHERE best_practices IS NOT NULL
SELECT project_name, documentation FROM project_knowledge_base WHERE project_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM project_knowledge_base WHERE project_name LIKE '%management%' AND best_practices IS NOT NULL;
SELECT project_name, best_practices FROM project_knowledge_base ORDER BY project_name ASC;
SELECT project_name, lessons_learned FROM project_knowledge_base ORDER BY project_id DESC;

SELECT project_id, project_name, documentation, best_practices, lessons_learned FROM project_knowledge_base WHERE documentation LIKE '%important%' AND best_practices LIKE '%effective%' ORDER BY project_id;
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, project_start_date FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, project_end_date FROM projects ORDER BY project_end_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM documentation WHERE doc_type = 'User Manual';
SELECT doc_title, doc_created_date FROM documentation ORDER BY doc_created_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM projects WHERE project_start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, project_start_date, project_end_date FROM projects ORDER BY project_start_date DESC;
SELECT doc_title, doc_type, doc_created_date FROM documentation WHERE doc_created_date > '2021-06-01';
SELECT projects.project_name, documentation.doc_title FROM projects INNER JOIN documentation ON projects.project_id = documentation.project_id;
SELECT * FROM project_documentation;
SELECT title, category FROM project_documentation;
SELECT id, title, content FROM best_practices WHERE topic = 'Security';
SELECT lesson, notes FROM lessons_learned ORDER BY project_id ASC;
SELECT id, topic, description, examples FROM best_practices WHERE topic = 'Performance' AND examples IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM project_documentation WHERE category = 'Documentation';
SELECT id, title FROM project_documentation WHERE title LIKE '%best%';
SELECT project_id, lesson FROM lessons_learned WHERE best_practice_applied = 'Yes' ORDER BY project_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM best_practices WHERE topic = 'Security' AND description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, topic, examples FROM best_practices WHERE id IN (SELECT id FROM lessons_learned WHERE best_practice_applied = 'Yes');
SELECT * FROM project_documentation;
SELECT project_name, project_owner FROM project_documentation;
SELECT documentation FROM project_documentation WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM best_practices ORDER BY practice_id DESC;
SELECT lesson_title, learned_from FROM lessons_learned WHERE lesson_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM project_documentation;
SELECT project_name, project_owner FROM project_documentation WHERE project_owner='John Smith';
SELECT * FROM best_practices ORDER BY category DESC;
SELECT practice_name, description FROM best_practices WHERE practice_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT reference_title, url FROM references WHERE project_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM Users
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM ProjectDocumentation
SELECT lesson_description, project_id FROM LessonsLearned
SELECT practice_name, created_at FROM BestPractices
SELECT comment_text, user_id, project_id FROM Comments
SELECT * FROM ProjectDocumentation;
SELECT project_name, created_at FROM ProjectDocumentation WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM ProjectDocumentation WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT u.username, c.comment_text FROM Users u INNER JOIN Comments c ON u.user_id = c.user_id;
SELECT p.project_name, l.lesson_description FROM ProjectDocumentation p LEFT JOIN LessonsLearned l ON p.project_id = l.project_id;
